item.title: The 2017 IC Cinema Spring All-Nighter
item.author: Felix Editor,Sophie Sagawe,
item.description: This year’s Spring All-Nighter will take place on Tuesday the 21st of March at 6pm, ending at approximately 7.45am the next day. For those who are inexplicably out of the loop with this beloved Imperial College tradition: it’s a whole night of films, shown back to back, on a screen 8 meters wide, …
